description: The Pakistani media boom is propelling anti-American conspiracy theories, with the Times Square bomb as the latest example. The United States is doing virtually nothing to counter the trend.
title: Losing the Media War in Pakistan
title_page: Losing the Media War in Pakistan - Video - NYTimes.com
text: The Pakistani media boom is propelling anti-American conspiracy theories, with the Times Square bomb as the latest example. The United States is doing virtually nothing to counter the trend.
